sentences.sContent: Some people believe the universe was created by a big explosion.
sentences.sCn: 有些人认为宇宙是通过一次大爆炸创造出来的。

sentences.sContent: Her behaviour is creating a lot of problems.
sentences.sCn: 她的行为引起了很多问题。

sentences.sContent: The new factory is expected to create more than 400 new jobs.
sentences.sCn: 这家新工厂预计能创造400多个新的就业机会。

sentences.sContent: ...Contemporary artists have followed this tradition to create eggs that speak to the anxieties of our age: Life is precious...
...Readiness to take advantage of new opportunities will make it easier to create one’s desired future...
...and how to create a set of ethical rules...
...It will be possible to create more sophisticated moral machines...
...No long does a good craftsman have to work in a job he dislikes all day and then try to create at night...
...while the swelling ranks of pensioners will create government budget problems...
...it can be challenging to create an environment in which people will freely disagree and argue...
...hobbies and interests to create the better conditions for their children...
...American parents worry that overuse of tablets will create problems with their kids' interpersonal relationships...

words.tran: 特别创造说；创造宇宙说

trans.tranOther: to make something exist that did not exist before
